channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investigation into woman's murder exposes an elaborate stalking plot
item.description: Kristil Krug told police in Broomfield, Colorado, that she and her husband, Dan Krug, were receiving threatening texts and emails from an ex-boyfriend...

item.title: The Setup Murder of Kristil Krug
item.description: A stalker sends menacing messages to a young mother before she is murdered. The investigation reveals a sinister setup. "48 Hour" correspondent Peter ...

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Suspect in National Guard attack struggled with ‘dark isolation’ as community raised concerns
item.description: The Afghan man accused of gunning down two National Guard members blocks from the White House last week had been unraveling for years.

item.title: Store receipt provides alibi for Utah man eyed in murder 500 miles away
item.description: Weeks before Kristil Krug, a married mother of three, was found murdered in her Colorado garage, she told police she and her husband Dan Krug had rece...

item.title: 4 killed, 10 wounded in shooting at "family gathering" in Stockton, officials say
item.description: The suspect in the shooting remains at large, authorities said.

item.title: 4 dead, 10 wounded in shooting at California banquet hall: Sheriff's office
item.description: Four people were killed and 10 others wounded in a shooting at a banquet hall in Stockton, California on Saturday evening, local authorities said.

item.title: Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe
Ramping up pressure, Trump says Venezuela airspace should be considered closed
item.description: President Donald Trump announced Saturday that the airspace above and surrounding Venezuela should be considered "closed in its entirety."

item.title: US halts all asylum decisions after shooting of National Guard members
WATCH: Military funeral in Kyiv for American volunteer fighter
item.description: ABC News’ Ian Pannell is in Kyiv, Ukraine, at the funeral of an American who lost his life fighting against Russia’s invasion.

item.title: 12-year-old girl rescued from sandbar collapse during family Thanksgiving outing

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
